sentences.en: According to the rules, no alcohol can be consumed on the premises.
sentences.cn: 按照规定, 场内不准饮酒.

sentences.en: At a table he sat and consumed beefsteak, flapjacks, doughnuts, and pie.
sentences.cn: 他走到桌前坐下,吃了牛排, 煎饼 、 炸面饼圈和馅饼.

sentences.en: Many people experienced a drop in their cholesterol levels when they consumed oat bran.
sentences.cn: 很多人食用燕麦麸后胆固醇水平下降了。

sentences.en: Millions of tons of ammonia are consumed annually in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在农业上每年要消耗成千上万吨的氨.

sentences.en: Parents completed questionnaires about the food and drink consumed by their children at the ages of three, four, seven and eight.
sentences.cn: 在调查中家长被要求填写有关他们孩子在三、四、七和八岁期间的食物和饮料消费问卷。

sentences.en: Scientists are tantalized by plants and trees because they store far more energy than is consumed by cars, trucks, trains and planes, and they do it by taking carbon out of the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 科学家对植物和树木储存的能量非常感兴趣，首先是因为它们的总量比汽车、卡车、火车和飞机消耗的还多，其次是因为能源来自空气中的碳。

sentences.en: The fire had consumed half the forest away before it was stopped.
sentences.cn: 大火在熄灭之前毁掉了树林的一半.

sentences.en: The fire soon consumed the wooden buildings.
sentences.cn: 大火很快就把那些木制建筑物烧毁了.

sentences.en: The man is consumed with the idea of going abroad.
There were glasses of champagne and cigars, but not many of either were consumed.
sentences.cn: 这里有香槟和雪茄，但两样东西都没怎么动。

sentences.en: They are consumed with jealousy at her success.
sentences.cn: 他们对她的成功充满了嫉妒。

sentences.en: We consumed much time and energy in writing this book.
sentences.cn: 我们写这本书消耗了很多时间和精力。

words.tran_cn: 消耗性的；浪费的；肺病的
保护消费者利益运动；用户至上主义
消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 消耗( consume的过去式和过去分词 )，烧毁，大吃，使充满（强烈的感情）
消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）
